summary: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Kenny Bee|Joey Wang|Anita Mui|Anthony Chan|Angie Chen|Yuen Wah Cheung|Gam-Kong Ho|Mei-Bo Lai|Sandy Lamb|Man Biu Lee|Yiu King Lee|Angel Leung|Mei-King Leung|On-Na Lui|Hong-Ning Ng|Bennett Pang|Man Kit Poon|Woon-Jing Shin|Fui-On Shing|Kai-Keung Sze|Alan Tam|Yuan-Ta Tsao|Alan Tsui|Chi Keung Wan|Jing Wong|Kam-Bo Wong|Wu Ma|Boon Chai Yat|Jan-Yiu Yeung|Danny Yip
title: Sha qi er ren zu
